title: What makes golf in Slovakia special?
itunes:author: The Slovak Spectator
itunes:summary:
This week’s podcast is special for golf enthusiasts. Don Stoll, a passionate golf player from the US, has played golf at some of Slovakia’s golf courses, most recently in Bojnice, and has a lot to say about them. Slovakia is a really interesting place: people go out to play by themselves, says Don. The scenery you get in Slovakia and the way courses are designed are different compared to the US.

Spectacular Slovakia travel podcast is the latest addition to our range of travel-related products.
shop.spectator.sme.sk/spectacular_sl…a_travel_guide
